__e: It has been suggested here... that she and her colored man were at her mother's house.
I guess daddy's housekeeper is the only one who thought that I should know that he was even in the hospital.
Since when does the old family retainer operate on a 40-hour week?
I can help with the bedroom then I'll sort out a room for his man and serve at dinner.
What he needs is a servant, and he already has that in you.
I was a housewife with a maid. Took you this long to figure out what I was doing all day?
